duration_in_months: ). Here's an explanation of the format I used. **JSON (JavaScript Object Notation)**: JSON is a lightweight data-interchange format that is easy to read and write. It is often used to exchange data between web servers, web applications, and web pages. JSON is a self-describing data format, which means that the structure of the data is represented in the data itself. JSON uses human-readable keys to represent the names of the data elements. JSON is language-independent, meaning that it can be used with any programming language. **Voluntary Set-Aside for Aboriginal Business**
-----------------------------------------------

This procurement includes a Voluntary Set-Aside for Aboriginal Business. The procurement requires the provision of temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies in one or more of the geographical Areas listed in Annex "A" Statement of Work, on an as and when requested basis.
